channel.title: Rare colours
channel.description: How i can change whips,Phat,Santas colours to red-cyan..etc..

item.title: Rare colours
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Pk6uhave2, post:5, topic:527752”][quote author=Yanev. link=topic=646503.msg4348250#msg4348250 date=1376238367]
pk3uhave2,items:whips
•dragon •cyan •iron •bronze •white •black •mithril •adamant •rune •steel.
[/quote]

Alright, but what color is “dragon”? A dark red I’m assuming?[/quote]
All these have been released before…

case 16000:

item.title: Rare colours
item.dc:creator: @Pk6uhave2 Pk6uhave2
item.description:
@Pk6uhave2 wrote:

I can help you with recolors, just not making models. Tell me exactly which color and which item you would like, I will let you know if I can do it or not.

Read full topic
